title: Microsoft explorapedia: the world of nature (PC)
brief_description: A wonderful multimedia exploration of the animal kingdom designed for children in primary school. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Multimedia PC with 486SX or higher processor; 4 MB or memory (8 MB recommended); at least 8MB of available hard-disk space; double-speed DC-ROM drive, audi board, and 256 colour Super VGA monitor; MS-DOS Windows operating system version 3.1 or later;
